subject: Cannot login to my account
description: I have been unable to access my account for the past 2 days. The password reset is not working either.

subject: Payment declined on file
description: My credit card is being declined even though it's valid and has sufficient funds available.

subject: App crashes on startup
description: The application throws an exception and crashes every time I try to start it on my machine.

subject: Feature request dark mode
description: It would be nice to have a dark mode option in the application for using at night.

subject: 2FA not working
description: I cannot complete 2-factor authentication and am locked out of my account.

subject: Invoice not received
description: I have not received my monthly invoice for the billing period.

subject: Export function fails
description: The export to CSV function fails with large datasets and throws an error.

subject: Page loads very slowly
description: The dashboard page takes 10 seconds to load which is unusually slow.

subject: Charged twice this month
description: I see two charges on my account for this month. Please investigate and refund.

subject: Mobile app sync issue
description: The mobile app does not sync data with the web version properly.

subject: Cannot add payment method
description: The system is not allowing me to add a new credit card as a payment method.

subject: Request API improvements
description: Would be great to have better error messages in the API responses for debugging.

subject: Production down
description: Critical production system is down and all users are impacted.

subject: Password reset broken
description: The password reset link is not working and I cannot reset my password.

subject: Minor UI cosmetic issue
description: Small spacing issue on the profile page that looks odd.

subject: Subscription cancellation issue
description: I cannot find how to cancel my subscription from the dashboard.

subject: API rate limit exceeded
description: Getting rate limit errors when calling the API even though I am within my quota.

subject: Duplicate charges
description: Multiple charges appearing on my account for a single transaction.

subject: Need better reporting
description: Would like more advanced reporting features for analytics and insights.

subject: SSL certificate warning
description: Getting SSL certificate warning when accessing the site on mobile.

subject: Feature suggestion filtering
description: Would like to have more filtering options in the search functionality.

subject: Account security concern
description: Noticed suspicious login attempt on my account from unknown location.

subject: Cannot upload files
description: File upload is failing with error message 413 payload too large.

subject: Refund not received
description: I submitted a refund request 3 weeks ago but have not received the money yet.

subject: Bug in date picker
description: The date picker component is not working correctly and selecting wrong dates.

subject: Email notifications not working
description: I am not receiving email notifications even though they are enabled in settings.

subject: Request export to PDF
description: It would be helpful to have PDF export functionality for reports and data.

subject: Language support missing
description: We need support for Spanish language in the user interface.

subject: Cannot reset 2FA
description: I lost my 2FA device and cannot access my account anymore.

subject: Billing address rejected
description: The system is rejecting my billing address and won't let me complete payment.

subject: Import functionality suggestion
description: Would be nice to have bulk import feature for user data management.

subject: Cannot access subscription details
description: I cannot view my current subscription details or manage my plan.

subject: Minor typo in interface
description: Found a small typo on the login page that should be corrected.

subject: Critical security issue
description: Found a serious security vulnerability that needs immediate attention.

subject: API documentation incomplete
description: The API documentation is missing important details and examples.

subject: Support for multi-currency
description: We need support for multiple currencies in the billing system.

subject: Authentication token expired
description: Getting authentication token expired errors frequently during normal use.

subject: Invoice format changed
description: The invoice format suddenly changed and it breaks our accounting system.

subject: Database connection timeout
description: Experiencing frequent database connection timeout errors.

subject: Request webhook support
description: Would like webhook support for integrating with third-party applications.

subject: Mobile app crashes frequently
description: The mobile application is crashing multiple times during normal usage.

subject: Missing tax calculation
description: The tax calculation is missing from invoices for certain regions.

subject: Request batch processing
description: We need batch processing capability for bulk operations on data.

subject: Cannot downgrade plan
description: I want to downgrade my subscription plan but the option is not available.

subject: Urgent production issue
description: Critical bug in production affecting all users transactions.

subject: Data backup request
description: I need to backup my data before making changes to my account.

subject: Request GDPR compliance
description: We need stronger GDPR compliance features and documentation.

subject: Slow API responses
description: API responses are taking too long to return causing timeouts.

subject: Minor UI improvement
description: The button alignment could be improved on the dashboard page.

subject: Security patch needed
description: We received security notification about a vulnerability that needs to be patched.
